EmailTemplate.name: Order Fulfillment Product Delivered - Social Post_Working with a Winner_TEAM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional working with a winner social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c")}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team At Five Star Professional, we work with thousands of outstanding professionals from across the country each year. Some winners that I would like to call special attention to are {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c..Display_Team_Name__c")}. {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c")} are {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} winners of our {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Associated_With__c")} award in {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c}.
One attribute common to all of our award winners is a dedication to service. {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c")} have stood out in this regard, as well. Because service is so central to our award, we believe that potential clients would be wise to work with these winners! For more information on {!NullValue(Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c")}, check out their social post. Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
